parameters.emailNotificationTemplate:
Welcome [NAME].

Your research project [MARKERTITLE] has been added to the UBC Okanagan interactive map at ORS; if you register and log in using this email address ([EMAIL]), then you will become the owner of the map marker containing your project details.

The following is a preview of the details of your project as it currently appears on the website:

[MARKERCONTENT]

Please visit the map and register at [SITEURL]. Once you register you can add and edit details about your project and include media such as video or photos. If you have any difficulties using the map or editing your project, please feel to contact us at [HELPEMAIL].

Thank you. [FROMNAME] - [FROMEMAIL]

config.script:
console.log(item); return 'Project Proposal Status: Proposal '+item.getId()+''+ '

Here you can see the status of a proposal


';

config.text:
Process Proposal

Lands Department members can process pending proposals submitted by proponents
Your role
Login
Register to access mapping service
Create an account

Spatial Feature Documents

You can attach various spatial feature documents to your proposal

Project Proposal

Registered Proponents are able to complete the proposal wizard. Proposal are reviewed and approved by Lands Department members

config.label: Project Title
config.message: add a title for your proposal

config.label: Project Description
config.message: add a description, you can attach documents and media

config.text:
Map Item Details

This section allows you to make changes to the content displayed on the map.

config.label: Title
config.message: the title for this map item

config.label: Description
config.message: the description for this map item

config.text:
Community Member Details

The community member associated with this map item is able to update and remove spatial data.
